==German== [[File:Vegetables - Viktualienmarkt - DSC08609.JPG|thumbnail|290px|'''Gemüse''']] ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|gemüese}}, a derivative of {{der|de|goh|muos||food, victuals, porridge}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*mōsą||porridge, food}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*meh₂d-|id=wet|t=wet, fat, dripping}}. Possibly cognate to {{cog|en|mush}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-Gemüse.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Gemüse.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{IPA|de|/ɡəˈmyːzə/}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Gemüses|Gemüse}} # {{lb|de|uncountable|countable}} [[vegetable]]; [[vegetables]] {{gloss|kinds of plants}} #: {{ux|de|Iss dein '''Gemüse'''!|Eat your '''vegetables'''!|inline=1}} # {{lb|de|uncountable|countable}} a [[season|seasoned]] vegetable-based [[side dish]], such as a [[relish]] (not necessarily pickled and not usually in the form of a paste) #: {{ux|de|Wir essen heute Hähnchenschnitzel mit Zwiebel-Möhren-'''Gemüse'''.|Today we’re having chicken cutlets with an onion and carrot '''relish'''.}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|Gemüsemischung |Gemüsemarkt |Gemüseabteilung |Gemüseladen |Gemüsegeschäft |Gemüsehändler }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Müsli}} * {{l|de|Apfelmus}} ===See also=== * {{l|de|Obst}} * {{l|de|Käse}} * {{l|de|Wild}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
